docs.snippet: President Obama and Pope Francis on Thursday skirted social issues that have generated tension between some Roman Catholic leaders and the president....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama and Pope Francis on Thursday skirted social issues that have generated tension between some Roman Catholic leaders and the president.
docs.abstract: Pres Obama and Pope Francis focus on common concerns such as income inequality and hope for global peace during their first meeting and avoid issues of abortion and same-sex marriage, on which they differ.

headline.seo: President Obama Meets With Pope Francis
headline.main: An Exchange of Views, Some in Accord
headline.print_headline: In Vatican Meeting, Obama and Pope Focus on Shared Accord
